text: Audincthun is a commune in the Pas-de-Calais department in northern France. ==Geography== A town located 20 miles (32 km) northeast of Montreuil-sur-Mer, at the junction of the D92 with the D133 road. ==Population== ==Personalities== * Albert de Dion, French automobile manufacturer (de Dion- Bouton), is buried in the family vault here. ==Sights== * The fifteenth century church of St. Pierre. * The eighteenth century church of St. Nicholas. * The Sainte-Soyette Chapel. * A line of 13 wind turbines are on the hills above the commune. ==See also== *Communes of the Pas-de-Calais department ==References== * INSEE commune file Category:Communes of Pas-de-Calais
title: Audincthun
